name: Your Best Nightmare (Early ver)
description:
Game still in development.

Game Intro

You play as Tom, a 21-year-old who lives a decent life to say the least. He has a job, goes to university, and lives with his parents. Tom wishes his life could be better, but nothing much he could do. 

But suddenly, on his way home, without him noticing, he gets hit by a truck! Oh no.

Tom wakes up in his house . . . or so he thinks. Everything looks different somehow, but he feels free. Maybe now it is his chance to get back at those he always wanted to get back.

Current Version:

Currently, the able is only able to move and have an attack animation that has no impact. 

Move: WASD or click to desired location

"Attack" : Right click

To leave the game, press the Windows button or Alt-TAB out of the game to be able to press the "X" to close the window.
